name: Smash The Bird - Endless Adventure Retro 8-Bit Game FREE
name_original: Smash The Bird - Endless Adventure Retro 8-Bit Game FREE
description:
****** Free Bird Shooting Game! *******

******* Intense flapping action ********

Feel the thrill of racing like never before in this action-packed, heart-thumping arcade shooting game.

Scramble into position. Fly and gun your way through a tropical landscape as you embark on a mission to help our birdy hero fight the formidable pack of evil villain birds. Tons of ammo is at your disposal and you'll need every last one of 'em. Race down to defeat them by shooting them all down!

Features:

* Multiple levels of excitement
* Awesome animation
* Easy controls
* Smooth and polished gameplay
* Precise physics simulation

Flap your way to victory!

Download FREE Today!
